titles.title: Freedom To Invest in Tomorrow's Workforce Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit certain expenses associated with obtaining or maintaining recognized postsecondary credentials to be treated as qualified higher education expenses for purposes of 529 accounts.
Freedom To Invest in Tomorrow's Workforce Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Freedom To Invest in Tomorrow's Workforce Act
This bill allows the use of funds in a qualified tuition program (commonly known as a 529 account) to pay for expenses associated with obtaining or maintaining recognized postsecondary credentials.
